name: volt-absorb

effect.diamond-pearl: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.
effect.platinum: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.

short_effect: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
flavor_text.platinum: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
